Metadata.title: DailyDevTools - Free Online Developer Tools
Metadata.description: 90+ free online tools for everyone. Formatters, converters, generators, and utilities. Fast, private, and no registration required.

MockDataGenerator.name: Mock Data Generator
MockDataGenerator.description: Generate random JSON or CSV data for testing purposes with custom schema.

NotFound.title: 404: Void Exception
NotFound.description: The page you requested seems to have been garbage collected or never existed in this runtime.
NotFound.suggestions: Try searching for a tool or browse our popular tools below.

Homepage.subtitle: Fast, beautiful, and privacy-focused tools for developers, designers, and everyone. Everything runs in your browser.
Homepage.noRecentText: Start using tools to see them here

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.desc: All tools run locally in your browser

private.title: 100% Private
private.desc: Your data never leaves your device

simple.title: Built for Everyone

cta.title: Ready to boost your productivity?
cta.text: Start using our developer tools for free. No signup required, no data collected, just pure productivity.
cta.feedbackText: Have an idea or found a bug? Your feedback drives what we build next.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using DailyDevTools, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

useLicense.title: 2. Use License
useLicense.content: DailyDevTools is free to use for personal and commercial purposes. You may not:
list: Attempt to reverse engineer or scrape significant portions of the site.
Use the website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website.

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The tools on DailyDevTools are provided "as is". We make no warranties, expressed or implied...

limitations.title: 4. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall DailyDevTools or its suppliers be liable for any damages...

revisions.title: 5. Revisions
revisions.content: The materials appearing on DailyDevTools could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors...

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: Welcome to DailyDevTools. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

localProcessing.title: 2. How Our Tools Work (Local Processing)
localProcessing.content: Most importantly: The tools run entirely in your browser. Data never leaves your device.

dataCollection.title: 3. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We do not collect content. We use Google Analytics for usage stats.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies for analytics and local preferences.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our site may contain links to third parties.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: Contact us via GitHub or social media.

Blog.title: Developer Resources
Blog.subtitle: Deep dives into the tools we build and the concepts behind them.

json-formatting-best-practices.title: JSON Formatting: Best Practices for Developers
json-formatting-best-practices.excerpt: Learn why proper JSON formatting matters for debugging and how to automate it in your workflow.

mastering-regex.title: Mastering Regular Expressions: A visual guide
mastering-regex.excerpt: Regex doesn't have to be scary. We break down common patterns for email validation, URLs, and more.

cron-job-scheduling.title: Cron Jobs Demystified: How to Schedule Tasks
cron-job-scheduling.excerpt: Understand the 5-star syntax of Cron and how to schedule backups, emails, and scripts on Linux.

secure-password-storage-local.title: Why Local Password Managers Are Safer (KeyPass Alternative)
secure-password-storage-local.excerpt: Cloud breaches are common. Learn why storing passwords locally with AES-256 encryption is the safest bet for personal security.

PasswordManager.title: Password Manager
PasswordManager.desc: Securely store and manage your passwords locally.
PasswordManager.unlockDesc: Enter your master password to access your accounts.
PasswordManager.createDesc: Set a strong master password. It encrypts your data locally.
PasswordManager.note: Data is stored in your browser using AES-GCM encryption. We cannot recover your password if lost.

VibrationTester.worksOnly: Works only on devices with vibration hardware (e.g. phones).

json-formatting-best-practices.block_2: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is the language of the web. But raw JSON returned from APIs is often a minified mess. formatting it makes it readable, debuggable, and safe.
json-formatting-best-practices.block_4: When you're debugging a 5000-line API response, indentation saves lives. Our JSON Formatter uses 2-space or 4-space indentation to make structure clear.
json-formatting-best-practices.block_6: A single missing comma can break your app. Always validate your JSON before committing it to config files.
json-formatting-best-practices.block_8: Don't waste time manually checking brackets. Use automated tools.

mastering-regex.block_2: Regular expressions are powerful but confusing. let's visualize them.
mastering-regex.block_4:
• Email: ^[\w-\.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4}$
  • Phone: ^\+?[1-9]\d{1,14}$
mastering-regex.block_5: Test these patterns instantly with our Regex Tester.

cron-job-scheduling.block_2: Minute, Hour, Day of Month, Month, Day of Week. That's all it is.
cron-job-scheduling.block_3:
* * * * * command_to_run

Examples

Run every day at midnight: 0 0 * * *
cron-job-scheduling.block_6: Run every 15 minutes: */15 * * * *
cron-job-scheduling.block_7: Need help? Use our Cron Generator to build expressions visually.

secure-password-storage-local.block_2: LastPass, Okta, and other giants have suffered breaches. When your vault is online, it's a target.
secure-password-storage-local.block_4: Our new Local Password Manager runs entirely in your browser. It uses AES-GCM 256-bit encryption derived from your master password using PBKDF2.
secure-password-storage-local.block_6:
• Zero Knowledge: We never see your password. It never leaves your device.
  • Offline Storage: Your encrypted vault is stored in your browser's LocalStorage.
  • Exportable: You can export/backup your raw encrypted data anytime.
secure-password-storage-local.block_7: Stop trusting the cloud with your master keys. Try the Local Password Manager today.
